 · [May 14](https://www.facebook.com/groups/959208695816460/?multi_permalinks=1036718374732158&hoisted_section_header_type=recently_seen&__cft__[0]=AZWKMk83_EptH4ljW1ZZx8ChYJL2pQATlnX9XzL1yjcbkTRjE61IIzv7EmJkp4iR5CUAyJOMa-nPsc4fLiR0afkyakCeifOimiAmmL5iHr5rHFpyj7gjGxVI-Y6PxIA5pOGVuSgmC377gdNXKUgMi3d74BoIhobPuMUSpYAMio95HGoyb4Zbutk0v9DBxs-rFSSZS3bU9-UVX77v3XWGWTiBkxTVO4j5GX2huy2na4jgrQ&__tn__=%2CO%2CP-R) · 

The "No Kings Day" protests scheduled for June 14, 2025, are shaping up to be a significant nationwide mobilization. Organized by Indivisible and the grassroots 50501 Movement, these events aim to counter President Trump's planned military parade in Washington, D.C., which critics view as an authoritarian display rather than a patriotic celebrate

Over 100 events have been registered across all 50 states, including Pennsylvania. In Philadelphia, a local protest is planned, aligning with the national movement's goals of defending democracy and opposing authoritarianism.

For more details on events in other states or to find a local protest near you, you can visit the official No Kings Day event page on Mobilize:

As Donald Trump plans a 6000-soldier parade on his birthday ..."

Indivisible And Partners Announce 'NO KINGS' Nationwide Day of ..."

No Kings on Mobilize"

### **Indivisible Guide**

[May 12](https://www.facebook.com/indivisibleguide/posts/1004153415233486?__cft__[0]=AZWKMk83_EptH4ljW1ZZx8ChYJL2pQATlnX9XzL1yjcbkTRjE61IIzv7EmJkp4iR5CUAyJOMa-nPsc4fLiR0afkyakCeifOimiAmmL5iHr5rHFpyj7gjGxVI-Y6PxIA5pOGVuSgmC377gdNXKUgMi3d74BoIhobPuMUSpYAMio95HGoyb4Zbutk0v9DBxs-rFSSZS3bU9-UVX77v3XWGWTiBkxTVO4j5GX2huy2na4jgrQ&__tn__=%2CO%2CP-y-R) · 

The biggest story on June 14 won’t be Trump’s birthday parade in DC — it will be what happens everywhere else. We’re taking to the streets on No Kings Day with events planned in all 50 states.
